query:
UPDATE
                politician AS p
            SET
                race_losses = race_losses - 1
            FROM
                race_candidates AS rc
            WHERE
                rc.candidate_id = p.id
                AND(
                    SELECT
                        winner_id FROM race
                    WHERE
                        race.id = rc.race_id) IS NOT NULL
                AND(
                    SELECT
                        winner_id FROM race
                    WHERE
                        race.id = rc.race_id) != p.id;
